game.name: Peace Dice
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The post-apocalypse. When some are trying to survive in a new world, others join the detective agency "Peace Dice", which searches for evidence of mutants. Go on a raid and don't come back empty-handed!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The post-apocalypse. When some are trying to survive in a new world, others join the detective agency "Peace Dice", which searches for evidence of mutants. Go on a raid and don't come back empty-handed!
